extension.searchTitle: To designate the National September 11 Memorial located at the World Trade Center site in New York City, New York, as a national memorial, and for other purposes.; 9/11 Memorial Act;H.R. 3036 (RH)

titleInfo.title: To designate the National September 11 Memorial located at the World Trade Center site in New York City, New York, as a national memorial, and for other purposes.

extension.action: Additional sponsors: Mr. McCaul, Mr. Pallone, Mr. Engel, Mr. Swalwell of California, Mr. Gibson, Ms. Jackson Lee, Mr. Cook, Mr. Donovan, Mr. Israel, Ms. Norton, Mr. Pierluisi, Miss Rice of New York, Mrs. Miller of Michigan, Mr. Sires, Mr. LoBiondo, Mrs. Watson Coleman, Mr. Curbelo of Florida, Mr. Moulton, Mr. Pascrell, Ms. Stefanik, Mr. Hultgren, Mr. Fitzpatrick, Mr. Katko, Mr. Payne, Mr. Sean Patrick Maloney of New York, Mr. Collins of New York, Mr. McClintock, Mr. Meeks, Ms. Kuster, Mr. Reed, Mr. Cole, Mr. Young of Alaska, Mrs. Mimi Walters of California, Mr. Rohrabacher, Mr. Vela, Mr. Knight, Mr. Sarbanes, Mr. Rangel, Mr. Cárdenas, Mr. Valadao, Mr. Costello of Pennsylvania, Mrs. McMorris Rodgers, Mr. Jenkins of West Virginia, Mr. Meehan, Mr. Hanna, Mr. Lance, Ms. Slaughter, Mr. Stivers, Mr. Diaz-Balart, Mr. Tonko, Mr. Bishop of Michigan, Mr. Mooney of West Virginia, Mr. Dent, Mr. Smith of New Jersey, Mr. Joyce, Mr. Hudson, Mr. Thornberry, Mr. Rodney Davis of Illinois, Mr. Poliquin, Mr. Amodei, Mr. Byrne, Ms. Meng, Ms. Gabbard, Mr. Reichert, Mr. Hunter, Mr. LaMalfa, Mr. Brendan F. Boyle of Pennsylvania, Mr. Nunes, Mr. Crowley, Mr. Frelinghuysen, Mr. Norcross, Mr. Garrett, Mr. Cicilline, Mr. Shuster, Mr. Graves of Missouri, Ms. Duckworth, Mr. Higgins, Ms. Velázquez, Mr. Royce, and Mr. Serrano
Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed

Mr. MacArthur (for himself, Mrs. Carolyn B. Maloney of New York, Mr. Calvert, Mr. King of New York, and Mr. Nadler) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources
